verses.verse: הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold יֽוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> Behold the day בָּ֖א <S%H935><s%> cometh לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְחֻלַּ֥ק <S%H2505><s%> shall be divided שְׁלָלֵ֖ךְ <S%H7998><s%> and thy spoil בְּקִרְבֵּֽךְ׃ <S%H7130><s%> in the midst

וְאָסַפְתִּ֨י <S%H622><s%> For I will gather אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִ֥ם ׀ <S%H1471><s%> all nations אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> against יְרוּשָׁלִַם֮ <S%H3389><s%> against Jerusalem לַמִּלְחָמָה֒ <S%H4421><s%> to battle וְנִלְכְּדָ֣ה <S%H3920><s%> shall be taken הָעִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> and the city וְנָשַׁ֙סּוּ֙ <S%H8155><s%> rifled הַבָּ֣תִּ֔ים <S%H1004><s%> and the houses וְהַנָּשִׁ֖ים <S%H802><s%> and the women [תִּשָּׁגַלְנָה כ] (תִּשָּׁכַ֑בְנָה <S%H7693><s%> lie with ק) וְיָצָ֞א <S%H3318><s%> shall go forth חֲצִ֤י <S%H2677><s%> and half הָעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> of the city בַּגּוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1473><s%> into captivity וְיֶ֣תֶר <S%H3499><s%> and the residue הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִכָּרֵ֖ת <S%H3772><s%> shall not be cut off מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> from the city

וְיָצָ֣א <S%H3318><s%> go forth יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God וְנִלְחַ֖ם <S%H3898><s%> and fight בַּגּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> against those nations הָהֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> those כְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> as when הִֽלָּחֲמ֖וֹ <S%H3898><s%> he fought בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day קְרָֽב׃ <S%H7128><s%> of battle

וְעָמְד֣וּ <S%H5975><s%> shall stand רַגְלָ֣יו <S%H7272><s%> And his feet בַּיּוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> in that day הַ֠הוּא <S%H1931><s%> he עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַ֨ר <S%H2022><s%> upon the mount הַזֵּתִ֜ים <S%H2132><s%> of Olives אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is in פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> which [is] before יְרוּשָׁלִַם֮ <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem מִקֶּדֶם֒ <S%H6924><s%> on the east וְנִבְקַע֩ <S%H1234><s%> shall cleave הַ֨ר <S%H2022><s%> and the mount הַזֵּיתִ֤ים <S%H2132><s%> of Olives מֵֽחֶצְיוֹ֙ <S%H2677><s%> in the midst מִזְרָ֣חָה <S%H4217><s%> thereof toward the east וָיָ֔מָּה <S%H3220><s%> and toward the west גֵּ֖יא <S%H1516><s%> valley גְּדוֹלָ֣ה <S%H1419><s%> great מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> [and there shall be] a very וּמָ֨שׁ <S%H4185><s%> shall remove חֲצִ֥י <S%H2677><s%> and half הָהָ֛ר <S%H2022><s%> of the mountain צָפ֖וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> toward the north וְחֶצְיוֹ־ <S%H2677><s%> and half נֶֽגְבָּה׃ <S%H5045><s%> of it toward the south

וְנַסְתֶּ֣ם <S%H5127><s%> And ye shall flee גֵּֽיא־ <S%H1516><s%> [to] the valley הָרַ֗י <S%H2022><s%> of the mountains כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יַגִּ֣יעַ <S%H5060><s%> shall reach גֵּי־ <S%H1516><s%> for the valley הָרִים֮ <S%H2022><s%> of the mountains אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אָצַל֒ <S%H682><s%> unto Azal וְנַסְתֶּ֗ם <S%H5127><s%> yea ye shall flee כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> you נַסְתֶּם֙ <S%H5127><s%> like as ye fled מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> from before הָרַ֔עַשׁ <S%H7494><s%> the earthquake בִּימֵ֖י <S%H3117><s%> in the days עֻזִּיָּ֣ה <S%H5818><s%> of Uzziah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּבָא֙ <S%H935><s%> shall come יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD אֱלֹהַ֔י <S%H430><s%> my God כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all קְדֹשִׁ֖ים <S%H6918><s%> [and] all the saints עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

וְהָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will be no יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become א֔וֹר <S%H216><s%> [that] the light יְקָר֖וֹת <S%H3368><s%> shall not be clear [יִקְפְּאוּן כ] (וְקִפָּאֹֽון׃ <S%H7087><s%> congeal ק)

וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> will come יוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> day אֶחָ֗ד <S%H259><s%> But it shall be one ה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> which יִוָּדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> which shall be known לַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> neither י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> not day וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor לָ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> nor night וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> will come לְעֵֽת־ <S%H6256><s%> time עֶ֖רֶב <S%H6153><s%> but it shall come to pass [that] at evening יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> will come אֽוֹר׃ <S%H216><s%> it shall be light

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <S%H1961><s%> become בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And it shall be in that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יֵצְא֤וּ <S%H3318><s%> shall go out מַֽיִם־ <S%H4325><s%> waters חַיִּים֙ <S%H2416><s%> [that] living מִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> from Jerusalem חֶצְיָ֗ם <S%H2677><s%> half אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward הַיָּם֙ <S%H3220><s%> sea הַקַּדְמוֹנִ֔י <S%H6931><s%> of them toward the former וְחֶצְיָ֖ם <S%H2677><s%> and half אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward הַיָּ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> sea הָאַחֲר֑וֹן <S%H314><s%> of them toward the hinder בַּקַּ֥יִץ <S%H7019><s%> in summer וּבָחֹ֖רֶף <S%H2779><s%> and in winter יִֽהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

וְהָיָ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> become יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> shall be king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> over all the earth בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִהְיֶ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> become יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> LORD אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> shall there be one וּשְׁמ֥וֹ <S%H8034><s%> and his name אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> one

יִסּ֨וֹב <S%H5437><s%> shall be turned כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הָאָ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> All the land כָּעֲרָבָה֙ <S%H6160><s%> as a plain מִגֶּ֣בַע <S%H1387><s%> from Geba לְרִמּ֔וֹן <S%H7417><s%> to Rimmon נֶ֖גֶב <S%H5045><s%> south יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem וְֽרָאֲמָה֩ <S%H7213><s%> and it shall be lifted up וְיָשְׁבָ֨ה <S%H3427><s%> and inhabited תַחְתֶּ֜יהָ <S%H8478><s%> site לְמִשַּׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate בִּנְיָמִ֗ן <S%H1144><s%> in her place from Benjamin's עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far מְק֞וֹם <S%H4725><s%> unto the place שַׁ֤עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הָֽרִאשׁוֹן֙ <S%H7223><s%> of the first עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הַפִּנִּ֔ים <S%H6434><s%> unto the corner וּמִגְדַּ֣ל <S%H4026><s%> and [from] the tower חֲנַנְאֵ֔ל <S%H2606><s%> of Hananeel עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> far יִקְבֵ֥י <S%H3342><s%> winepresses הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king's

וְיָ֣שְׁבוּ <S%H3427><s%> And [men] shall dwell בָ֔הּ וְחֵ֖רֶם <S%H2764><s%> in it and there shall be no more utter destruction לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will no יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer וְיָשְׁבָ֥ה <S%H3427><s%> inhabited יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> but Jerusalem לָבֶֽטַח׃ <S%H983><s%> shall be safely

וְזֹ֣את ׀ <S%H2063><s%> likewise תִּֽהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become הַמַּגֵּפָ֗ה <S%H4046><s%> And this shall be the plague אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יִגֹּ֤ף <S%H5062><s%> will smite יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> wherewith the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> all the people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who צָבְא֖וּ <S%H6633><s%> that have fought עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> against Jerusalem הָמֵ֣ק ׀ <S%H4743><s%> shall consume away בְּשָׂר֗וֹ <S%H1320><s%> Their flesh וְהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> they עֹמֵ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> while they stand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against רַגְלָ֔יו <S%H7272><s%> upon their feet וְעֵינָיו֙ <S%H5869><s%> and their eyes תִּמַּ֣קְנָה <S%H4743><s%> shall consume away בְחֹֽרֵיהֶ֔ן <S%H2356><s%> in their holes וּלְשׁוֹנ֖וֹ <S%H3956><s%> and their tongue תִּמַּ֥ק <S%H4743><s%> shall consume away בְּפִיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6310><s%> in their mouth

וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> will come בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he תִּֽהְיֶ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> will fall מְהֽוּמַת־ <S%H4103><s%> tumult יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD רַבָּ֖ה <S%H7227><s%> [that] a great בָּהֶ֑ם וְהֶחֱזִ֗יקוּ <S%H2388><s%> shall be among them and they shall lay hold אִ֚ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one יַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> on the hand רֵעֵ֔הוּ <S%H7453><s%> of his neighbour וְעָלְתָ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> shall rise up יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> and his hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> against the hand רֵעֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H7453><s%> of his neighbour

וְגַ֨ם־ <S%H1571><s%> also יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> And Judah תִּלָּחֵ֖ם <S%H3898><s%> also shall fight בִּירֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> at Jerusalem וְאֻסַּף֩ <S%H622><s%> shall be gathered together חֵ֨יל <S%H2428><s%> and the wealth כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הַגּוֹיִ֜ם <S%H1471><s%> of all the heathen סָבִ֗יב <S%H5439><s%> round about זָהָ֥ב <S%H2091><s%> gold וָכֶ֛סֶף <S%H3701><s%> and silver וּבְגָדִ֖ים <S%H899><s%> and apparel לָרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> abundance מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> in great

וְכֵ֨ן <S%H3651><s%> So תִּֽהְיֶ֜ה <S%H1961><s%> become מַגֵּפַ֣ת <S%H4046><s%> And so shall be the plague הַסּ֗וּס <S%H5483><s%> of the horse הַפֶּ֙רֶד֙ <S%H6505><s%> of the mule הַגָּמָ֣ל <S%H1581><s%> of the camel וְהַחֲמ֔וֹר <S%H2543><s%> and of the ass וְכָ֨ל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַבְּהֵמָ֔ה <S%H929><s%> and of all the beasts אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after יִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become בַּמַּחֲנ֣וֹת <S%H4264><s%> tents הָהֵ֑מָּה <S%H1992><s%> that shall be in these כַּמַּגֵּפָ֖ה <S%H4046><s%> as this plague הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> it

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> will come כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any הַנּוֹתָר֙ <S%H3498><s%> And it shall come to pass [that] every one that is left מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> of all the nations הַבָּאִ֖ים <S%H935><s%> which came עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> against Jerusalem וְעָל֞וּ <S%H5927><s%> shall even go up מִדֵּ֧י <S%H1767><s%> from שָׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> year בְשָׁנָ֗ה <S%H8141><s%> to year לְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֹת֙ <S%H7812><s%> to worship לְמֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> the King יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts וְלָחֹ֖ג <S%H2287><s%> and to keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חַ֥ג <S%H2282><s%> the feast הַסֻּכּֽוֹת׃ <S%H5521><s%> of tabernacles
